page.title: 12HOUSING
page.content: {Survey Results { }We did not have enough information on Kenton's buildings so we did a survey Kenton is a small but expanding village,there are 365 buildings and 1,100 to 1,200 people.Since 1983 Kenton's buildings have increaced by 20%, but since 1971 it has increaced by 45%.Although Kenton is expanding 27% of buildings are over 100 years old,most of these are on the main A379 through the centre of the village.The biggest style of houses is detached, 30% next was semi detached with 23% bungalows were next with 18%, then next were terraces with 15%.There are very few flats,only 1%.For an old village there are only 6% thatched cottages,and only 0.5% non_thatched cottages.
